price: 14. Oyo nde lifelo oyo bozalaki kotiyela yango tembe.
arabic: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi al-nāru allatī kuntum bihā tukadhibūna
